Handle:
Field Medic
Your [Key:Target_FirstAid_DisplayName] healing is increased by 25%. This bonus Healing is also applied on yourself, if the skill was used on another character.

Field Officer
Your [Key:Shout_Reload_DisplayName] inspires you and allies in a 8m range around you after completion for 1 turn.

New Skill: Grenade Assault
Every ally in a radius of 13 meters around you will throw grenades at the target location, resulting in a large blast radius. Grenades thrown by allies can scatter up to 5m from the initial target.

No Escape!
Blazing Flare's explosion-radius is increased by 3m.

Rapid Advance
Your [Key:Rush_Musk_Blitzkrieg_DisplayName] costs 1 AP to use and also grants MagicArmor.

Locked and Loaded
Your [Key:Shout_Reload_DisplayName] invigorates you after completion and grants Hasted for 1 turn.

Born Athlete
[Key:Target_Musk_Steadfast_DisplayName] reduces movement speed by 25% instead of 75%.

Lethal Stray
Buckshot's explosion effect on impact is extended by 2m.

All shall Perish!
Your [Key:Projectile_Rend_The_Marked_DisplayName] maximum amount of targets is increased to 5.

Steady Breathing
Your [Key:Shout_Reload_DisplayName] grants you bonus piercing damage and critical chance for your next weapon attack.

New Skill: Concentrated Terror
Only useable when stealthed. Fire off a round at an unsuspecting enemy, dealing [SkillDamage:Projectile_Musk_Matchlock_Concentrated_Terror] and causing it to take damage when moving for 1 turn.
Fears marked characters for 1 turn

Bullethell
[Key:Projectile_Bullethell_DisplayName] now launches 11 missiles per target instead of 7.
